summary: I RECEIVED A RECALL LETTER ON MY PASSENGER SIDE AIRBAG NEARLY ONE YEAR AGO.  TO DATE, I HAVE NOT RECEIVED NOTICE THAT THIS AIRBAG WILL BE REPLACED.  I HAVE NOT ALLOWED A PASSENGER IN THE FRONT SEAT OF MY CAR THIS PAST YEAR.  I HAVE CONTACTED LINCOLN SEVERAL TIMES ASKING WHEN MY AIRBAG WILL BE REPLACED TO NO AVAIL.  HELP!
